function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 due to lack of containment measures","Impact":"High infection rates, overwhelmed healthcare systems, and increased mortality","Mitigation":"Implementing strict containment measures, promoting vaccination, and enforcing public health regulations","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, telehealth platforms, and surveillance systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Governments, public health institutions, and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Long-term economic impact of COVID-19","Impact":"Global recession, job loss, and increased poverty","Mitigation":"Implementing economic stimulus packages, supporting affected industries, and promoting job creation","Technologies":"Economic forecasting models, financial support systems, and unemployment benefit platforms","People":"Workers, businesses, and low-income populations","Owner":"Governments, financial institutions, and international organizations"},{"Description":"Propagation of misinformation and disinformation about COVID-19","Impact":"Increased public distrust, reluctance to follow public health guidance, and potential harm from false remedies","Mitigation":"Promoting accurate information, debunking myths, and enforcing transparency in data communication","Technologies":"Disinformation tracking tools, fact-checking platforms, and secure data sharing systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and authorities","Owner":"Media organizations, public health institutions, and regulatory bodies"}]}
